FuncDef: This command echoes arguments on the command line. The primary use of this command is to allow messages to be displayed to the screen in files executed with theexeccommand.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies a text string to be echoed up to 256 characters.
Specifies more text to be echoed up to 256 characters.
Specifies more text to be echoed up to 256 characters.
